issue.title: [Python] Version in manylinux1 wheel builds is wrong
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3083](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3083). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not sure if this is a regression but I noticed:

https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/417498434#L2665

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3083?focusedCommentId=16584971) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
This is probably an artefact of having more than 50 PRs merged since the 0.10 tag. Increasing the git clone depth might fix this, giving this a try.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3083?focusedCommentId=16585437) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2447
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2447>
